overview: Dennis came to Ecast from Rioport, where he was one of the original members and led the development of the first portable digital media player for consumers. Dennis has more than 25 years experience in computer technology on both the hardware and software sides. In addition to leading Ecast hardware development, Dennis serves as Ecastâ€™s technology strategist, working with business development and engineering to identify viable vertical market opportunities and map them to Ecast technology. Dennis has a long track record of fresh thinking and practicality that has lead to success. In his formative years, he was part of the team at International Imaging Systems that developed Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI) technology. Dennis founded Asystem in 1991, building it into a leading multimedia software company and selling it profitably in 1996 to Midisoft.
